column4: i did download the last virtualbox version, i did a virtual machine with fedora 10, but.... the maximun resolution that i got was 1024x768 and my notebook aceppt 1200x800. I read an article and sugested this command line: VBoxMachine controlvm "virtualmachinename" setvideomodehint "1200" "800" "32". Unhapiness, don't work. Many erros about comand line and parameters.
Wow, I have only got 800x600 in Virtualbox :-(
